get.description: Health check endpoint for the Lyceum FastAPI Server.
Get FastAPI and system version information.

post.description:
Login with email and password, return JWT tokens.
This JWT can be used directly with MinIO STS.
Refresh an access token using a refresh token.

get.description: List all API keys for the authenticated user.

schema.title: Response List Api Keys Api V2 External Auth Api Keys  Get

post.description: Create a new API key for the authenticated user.

get.description: Check user's authentication status and profile information.

delete.description: Permanently delete user account and all associated data.

post.description:
Start Docker container execution asynchronously and return a streaming URL.

This endpoint returns immediately with an execution_id and streaming_url. The actual execution happens asynchronously. Use the streaming_url to receive real-time output logs as the job runs.

Start Python code execution asynchronously and return a streaming URL.

This endpoint returns immediately with an execution_id and streaming_url. The actual execution happens asynchronously. Use the streaming_url to receive real-time output logs as the job runs.

get.description: Get the current status of an execution.
List all non-completed executions for the current user.

schema.title: Response List Non Complete Executions Api V2 External Workloads List Get

post.description: Abort a specific execution by setting cancel=true in the database.

get.description: List files in user's S3 bucket.

schema.title: Response List Files Api V2 External Storage List Files Get

post.description: Upload a file to user's S3 bucket.
Upload multiple files at once, optionally preserving folder structure.

get.description: Download a file from user's S3 bucket.

delete.description: Delete a file from user's S3 bucket.
Delete all files in a folder (by prefix).

post.description: Generate temporary MinIO/S3 storage credentials using STS.

get.description: Get detailed user credits information including Stripe data.

post.description: Create a Stripe checkout session for purchasing credits.

get.description: Get combined billing activities (executions + credit purchases).

post.description: Create and start a new VM instance with the specified hardware profile and configuration.

get.description: List all VM instances for the authenticated user.
Check available hardware profiles and current capacity.
Get detailed status of a specific VM instance.

delete.description: Terminate and delete a VM instance.
